name: .FGROM
summary: Learn about .FGROM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open FGROM files with FragRoom in Windows. While other shader tools could open the GLSL portion of an FGROM file, the added configuration options are specific to FragRoom and may cause errors in programs that do not recognize them.
Since FGROM files store plain text, you can also open them with a source code or plain text editor. Some options include Microsoft Visual Studio Code, Microsoft Notepad, and Apple TextEdit.
